name: Squirmunity: Ballad of the Prankmonger
description:
You are a Cube. This is the tale of how you Squirted into the Munity. Not in an erotic way, but in a fun-loving cube way!

Have a little Epilepsy? You'll die if you play this game. But hey, is that going to stop you from having a great time at SQUIRMUNITY : Ballad of the Prankmonger?

Like our game? It's just a demo, but the full release is pending.  Join the community here!
